item.title: Factors Influencing Choice of Split Connections
item.description: Factors Influencing Choice of Split Connections Safety Related Factors Strength How strong does a connector in a highline split need to be?

item.title: Grog Splice Full Break Tests
item.description: Complete Grog Breaktests Main Test These are the unedited values for the 20 breaktests of grog splices completed in June 2022.

item.title: Grog Splices
item.description: Grog Splices Grog splices are a new method of connecting split highlines, but have already gained fans for being the lowest volume split connector.

item.title: Splicing Grogs On Site
item.description: In my original post about grog splices, I said it took about 10 minutes to splice a full connection in the field.
